A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't want to spoil anything\, but suffice it to say my first feeling walking out of the theater was disappointment. And the longer I disgest The Last Jedi\, the more disappointment I feel. It's a visually stunning movie so riddled with plot holes\, bizarre choices\, and complete failure to recognize it was the follow up to Episode VII and all the open questions of that movie that I can't get passed that. Star Wars or not.
